description.value:
Hellenrae makes three melee attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Evasion. If Hellenrae is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a &Reference[dex]{Dexterity} saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Stunning Strike (Recharge 5–6). When Hellenrae hits a target with a melee weapon attack, the target must succeed on a [[/save con 13 format=long]] or be &Reference[stunned]{stunned} until the end of Hellenrae’s next turn.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Unarmored Defense. While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} modifier.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Unarmored Movement. While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her speed increases by 20 feet (included in her speed).

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Hellenrae adds 3 to her AC against one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit her. To do so, she must be able to sense the attacker with her &Reference[blindsight]{blindsight}. If the attack misses, Hellenrae can make one melee attack against the attacker if it is within her reach.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
